nodes.text: Rand was a Human male who served as the commander of the Infinite Army, a group of supersoldiers implanted with Rakata technology by the Order of Revan. Rand commanded soldiers of the Infinite Army in defense of the Temple of the Ancients on the planet Lehon when a group of independent operatives invaded the Temple during the Galactic War, and he was slain in battle.
Commander Rand appears as one of the bosses in the "Legacy of the Rakata" Tactical Flashpoint in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
